name: The Future Of Days
description:
A tribute to William Blake’s artwork ‘The Ancient Of Days’, recently minted on the blockchain by the Whitworth Museum. 

My artwork reflects my desire to look forward, to the future of blockchain and art. To view ourselves in the role of the creator, of the reality which we wish to experience. 

This artwork is an animated photograph of a handmade wool felt artwork, made using traditional wet felting methods.
